org.matsim.pt.transitSchedule.api

Interface TransitRouteStop

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransitRouteStopImpl

    public interface TransitRouteStop
    Describes the stop within a route of a transit line. Specifies also at what time a headway is expected at the stop as offset from the route start.
    Author:
    mrieser

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getArrivalOffset() 
      double getDepartureOffset() 
      TransitStopFacility getStopFacility() 
      boolean isAwaitDepartureTime()
      Returns whether a driver should wait until the specified departure time has come before departing, especially if the driver is too early at the stop.
      void setAwaitDepartureTime(boolean awaitDepartureTime)
      Specifies if a driver should wait until the specified departure time has come before departing, especially if the driver is too early at the stop.
      void setStopFacility(TransitStopFacility stopFacility) 

    • Method Detail

      • getStopFacility

        TransitStopFacility getStopFacility()

      • setStopFacility

        void setStopFacility(TransitStopFacility stopFacility)

      • getDepartureOffset

        double getDepartureOffset()

      • getArrivalOffset

        double getArrivalOffset()

      • setAwaitDepartureTime

        void setAwaitDepartureTime(boolean awaitDepartureTime)
        Specifies if a driver should wait until the specified departure time has come before departing, especially if the driver is too early at the stop. Requires that a departure offset is set for this stop.
        Parameters:
        awaitDepartureTime - true if the driver should wait if too early
        See Also:
        getDepartureOffset()

      • isAwaitDepartureTime

        boolean isAwaitDepartureTime()
        Returns whether a driver should wait until the specified departure time has come before departing, especially if the driver is too early at the stop. Can only be interpreted if a departure offset is set for this stop.
        Returns:
        true if drivers should wait until the departure time has passed before departing, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getDepartureOffset()
